Content.summary: 'Umbraco backup version 1.01 is released' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Technology Internet written on 08 August 2006
Content.bodyText:
Umbraco backup version 1.01 is released and available for download from the project homepage.

This latest version will now backup virtual directories (if permissions allow) and FTP your backup to a remote machine.

The user guide and restore tools will be added in the next day or two.
